title: What is the best program to convert FLAC to WAV? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can easily do it using VLC media player. Open VLC media player, Media->Convert/Save Click on Add, and select your FLAC file. and click on Convert/Save. In the Profile drop-down menu, select Audio-wav. Click on Browse, and select your destination folder and enter your file name and click Save. Now click on Start and Voila, there's your wav file. P.S- I did this VLC media player version 2.2.2

For fast and lossless conversion, HD Video Converter Factory Pro is a good option. It also provides many other features like downloading and editing files. VLC is also a good free solution yet it may take much time to convert FLAC to WAV. There are some free online converters that also can handle this task, personally, http://Covnertio.com is my favorite handy option and HD Video Converter Factory Pro helps me to convert large files without hassle.
